levels.description: Particle limit <@ba.vup>+3</> and immediately gains <@ba.vup>{extra_cnt}</> Particles. Particle orbit radius expands, and all allies in attack range gain <$ba.inspire>Inspiration</> equal to <@ba.vup>{attack@atk:0%}</> of Civilight Eterna's ATK. Particles no longer collide with allied Operators, and instead deal <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> of Civilight Eterna's ATK as True damage when colliding with an enemy unit, and also <$ba.root>Binding</> them for <@ba.vup>{unmoveable_duration}</>s.
